p: The study findings confirm the HEV as the prime etiological agent of this outbreak of acute hepatitis. HEV is documented to be major cause of outbreaks of acute hepatitis in developing countries like India.[ 13 14] These outbreaks are reported from various parts of the country viz., Chattisgarh,[ 6] West Bengal,[ 15] Ahmedabad,[ 16] and Punjab.[ 17 18]
